name: Blue Druid 1 - Hero DAO at MCON 2022

metadata.name: Blue Druid #1 - Hero DAO at MCON 2022 1/1
metadata.description:
As part of our Hero DAO event at MCON 2022, we took hero ideas from members of the community. One of those ideas, Blue Druid was voted by those participating as the best! The simple idea has been turned into a 1 page concept art owned by Hero DAO, a community controlled superhero franchise.

This mini-comic will be auctioned off to MCON attendees and 100% of the revenue will be donated to public goods as decided by Hero DAO. The owner of this NFT shall own this specific comic, but the claim to Intellectual Property for the characters shown remain with Hero DAO.

properties.name: Blue Druid #1 - Hero DAO at MCON 2022
